metadata.name: Silenced
metadata.description:
In the face of tyranny and oppression, a voice is born. From the struggles and pain of a people, art is created. This piece is a testament to those who refuse to be silenced, to those who refuse to be unseen. It is a celebration of the power of self-expression and the resilience of the human spirit. 
                              
My voice once strong, now silenced and still  
My words, once free, now trapped against my will  
My thoughts, once open, now locked in my mind  
My spirit, once soaring, now confined

I've been silenced by fear, by hate, by lies  
By those who seek to control, to dominate, to trivialize  
But deep within my soul, my voice still echoes loud  
And one day, it will break free from this oppressive shroud

For my words are my power, my truth, my light  
And no one can take that away, no matter how hard they might  
So I'll keep speaking, keep fighting, keep standing tall  
For my voice is mine, and it will be heard, after all.

Artist: Aaron - Open Plains Studios  
Dimension: 1024 x 1024  
Resolution: 300 DPI  
Year Created: 2023

License:

With the purchase of this NFT, the artist grants the primary holder the license to sell, trade, or transfer the NFT on the blockchain. The NFT may be shown privately, in commercial and non-commercial venues, and in groups with an unlimited number of members. The license allows for unrestricted use and displays in virtual and real galleries, essays, and films. The holder of this non-exclusive license may also share on social media platforms with proper attribution.

The artist retains ownership of the underlying work's copyright, intellectual property rights, and reproduction rights. This art will be minted only once as an edition on the Ethereum Blockchain, and no other editions will be produced on this or any other blockchain by the artist.
